item.description: I am an Assistant Professor at the Department of Economics at PUC-Rio. My research is in Development, Political Economy, and Environmental Economics, with an agenda on decentralization, public service delivery, deforestation, and racial inequality. I have co-founded Base dos Dados, an open data repository and search engine for Brazil. It facilitates data work for academics, journalists, policy makers, and developers.
